name: KILL KILL KILL (Gustavo Gama)
description:
Play as Boris the Clown, a cannibal serial killer breaking out of jail and killing cops!

CONTROLS:   ARROWS/WASD walk   X attacks   SPACEBAR jump

Made for My First Game Jam, this is my first attempt at making a whole game by myself, didn't turn out perfect but I'm happy with the final results. For more of my work check out my instagram  https://www.instagram.com/gg.gama/
